messages.subject: Re: Conference commercial, was just saying hi (introduction)
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/6/2003 9:24:48 AM Eastern Standard Time, ... See, Kelly, I m taking another approach... sending telepathetic (yes, that was deliberate)
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/6/2003 9:24:48 AM Eastern Standard Time,
Unschooling-Discussion@yahoogroups.com writes:

> I'm Karen (in case you missed my intro). I have a 3 1/2 year old dd,
> Brogan Elizabeth - we live in Southeastern CT (Groton)
>
> Next year in August there's going to be an Unschooling Conference just north
> of Boston - I'd highly recommend attending it should answer a lot of your
> dh's questions / concerns.
>
>

See, Kelly, I'm taking another approach... sending telepathetic (yes, that
was deliberate) messages so OTHER'S publicize the conference.

Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
